unnormalised: Thik aseh, tohwiwba differential calculus sonjwinwi swnang hai, ne? Bejwng khalamjabwi. normalised: Thik aachoi, kunb√°o differential calculus hongrai sanj√†inwi habaibwi san? B√°i! Be√°bo n√°ngl√≠ jaksith√°i, bhai!
